description: Production CORS Hotfix & Terraform Configuration Cleanup
releaseNotes: Production hotfix for CORS configuration and infrastructure cleanup: (1) Fixed production billing page CORS errors by updating ALLOWED_ORIGINS to support multiple domains; (2) Successfully synchronized Terraform workspace state (serial 120â†’125); (3) Removed deprecated TRANSCRIPT_STORAGE_BUCKET variable from render_web_service and render_background_worker; (4) Deployed with zero downtime (API: 8s, Worker: 5s, DB: 1s); (5) Created comprehensive deployment documentation including .deployment-log.md and .plan-verification.md; (6) Implemented state backup strategy with timestamped backups (20251003-173451); (7) Verified CORS functionality for both production (https://coachly.doxa.com.tw) and localhost (http://localhost:3000) origins. All changes maintain backward compatibility while fixing critical production API access issues.
author: Coachly Team
